hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct t from Teacher t, School ss, Professional pp where (:name is null or t.name like :name) and (:school is null or (ss.id = t.schoolId and ss.name like :school)) and (:professional is null or (pp.id = t.professionalId and pp.name like :professional)) and (:requirement is null or t.requirement like :requirement) and (:grade is null or t.grade = :grade) order by t.updateDate desc
from Teacher as t where t.telePhone = :telePhone
